definition: general congress/meeting of the whole committee

sentences.english: Religions die when they are proved to be true.
sentences.chinese: 疑惑是所有宗學的一全體。

sentences.english: All shareholders of the company agree to the deregistration.
sentences.chinese: 公司全體股東同意撤銷註冊。

sentences.english: The agreement still requires ratification from the full Senate and the Russian Duma.
sentences.chinese: 該協議仍然需要參議院全體議員和俄羅斯杜馬的批准。

sentences.english: All crew members assembled on boat deck and exercised abandon ship drill.
sentences.chinese: 全體船員在艇甲板上集合，進行棄船演習。

sentences.english: I'm driving collectively a country roadvertising oned I'm completely lost.
sentences.chinese: 我開車順着一條鄉下小路前行，我一經全體迷路了。

sentences.english: The whole community turned out to wipe out the four pests.
The leader criticized him in the meeting for the whole staff, hoping to caution others.
sentences.chinese: 領導在全體職工大會上批評他，目的是以一儆百。

sentences.english: The cast of the 40th season of "Sesame Street.
sentences.chinese: 《芝麻街》第40季的全體演職人員合影。

sentences.english: The full cast will be announced next year and filming will begin in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 全體演職員表將於明年公佈，並在春天開拍。

sentences.english: He felt he lost face when his teacher scolded him in front of the class.
sentences.chinese: 當老師當着全體同學的面批評他時他感到面子大丟。

sentences.english: He spoke on behalf of all the members of the faculty and staff.
sentences.chinese: 他代表全體教職員工講了話。

sentences.english: Our goal is for all Singaporeans to enjoy the fruits of growth.
sentences.chinese: 我們的目標是讓全體人民分享經濟增長的成果。

sentences.english: He has all his life been rebellious.
sentences.chinese: 他全體的生活都是反水的。

sentences.english: Make sure this order is brought to the attention of all IDF soldiers".
sentences.chinese: 此令務必傳達全體以色列國防軍士兵。

sentences.english: But still, you can't called on all of female compatriots give priority on fatties.
sentences.chinese: 但不能號召全體女同胞把對象優先放在胖子身上。

sentences.english: The whole audience rose as the Chancellor and the Ambassador walked onto the rostrum and took their seats.
sentences.chinese: 全體聽衆起立，彭定康校長和劉大使走上主席臺落座。

definition: to be present/to be on the scene
